data.text:
कैसी होगी गीली मिट्टी से बने दिलों की कहानी , सुनिए इस दिवाली अमृतराय जी द्वारा गीली मिट्टी |

To subscribe to the podcast directly, simply click here & head to your favorite podcast app & Subscribe

What’s special about today’s story?

Realization of our own emotions hidden deep down our hearts makes this story special. Listen to Gilli Mitti written by Amritrai ji.

About Author – Amritrai

Amrit Rai was an Indian writer, poet and biographer in Hindi and Urdu. He was the son of Munshi Premchand , a pioneer of modern Urdu Literature and of Hindi Literature. A prolific writer, Rai made his literary debut with novel Beej in 1952 and went on to write an acclaimed biography of his father, Premchand, Kalam ka Sipahi (1970), which later won him the for Sahitya Academy Award 1963.

To know more about Amrit Rai ji visit his Wikipedia page AmritRai.

Link to today’s story Gilli Mitti.
